definition: (of a pair of horses) to pull side by side/to be side by side/to be fused together/parallel (literary style)

sentences.english: Pianlipai was a tradition opera that bring about prosperity in the middle and end of Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 骈俪派是兴盛于明代中后期的一个戏曲流派。

definition: poetry in the style of 離騷|离骚[Li2 Sao1]
regular verse/strict poetic form with eight lines of 5, 6 or 7 syllables and even lines rhyming
a genre of poetry, developed in the Tang Dynasty, characterized by its strict form
Shen Yue (441-513), writer and historian during Liang of Southern dynasties 南朝梁, compiler of History of Song of the Southern dynasties 宋書|宋书
(literary) to remonstrate with one's superior tactfully
genre of writing/literary form/style/literary recreation and sporting activities
variant of 諷喻|讽喻[feng3 yu4]
